gains.name: Forest Dragon
gains.label: Forest Dragon (Heavy Claws (A6, AP(1)), Stomp (A4, AP(1)), Breath Attack, Defense(1), Fear(2), Flying, Tough(12))

option.label: Forest Dragon (Heavy Claws (A6, AP(1)), Stomp (A4, AP(1)), Breath Attack, Defense(1), Fear(2), Flying, Tough(12))

loadout.name: Forest Dragon
loadout.label: Forest Dragon (Heavy Claws (A6, AP(1)), Stomp (A4, AP(1)), Breath Attack, Defense(1), Fear(2), Flying, Tough(12))

upgrade.label: Upgrade up to three models with one
Upgrade up to three models with one

specialRules.name: Rallying Call
specialRules.description: Whilst inside terrain, this model and its unit get +1 to hit rolls when shooting.

specialRules.name: Malice
specialRules.description: Enemies get -1 to hit in melee when attacking units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.name: Wild Hunt
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Ambush.

specialRules.name: Monster Hunter
specialRules.description: This model's melee weapons get AP(+2) against units where most models have Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.name: Unique
specialRules.description: This unit may only be taken once per army.

specialRules.name: Battle Call
specialRules.description: Whilst inside terrain, this model and its unit get +1 to hit rolls in melee.

specialRules.name: War Dance
specialRules.description: When in melee, roll one die and apply one bonus to all models with this rule. On a 1-3 attacks get Rending, on a 4-6 attacks get AP(+1).

specialRules.name: Rot Touch
specialRules.description: Once per this unit's activation, before attacking, pick one enemy unit within 6". Next time it moves, it moves -2” when using Advance, and -4” when using Rush/Charge.

specialRules.name: Warning Cry
specialRules.description: Enemy units  using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model.

specialRules.name: Breath Attack
specialRules.description: Once per this model's activation, before attacking, roll one die. On a 2+ one enemy unit within 6" in line of sight takes 1 hit with Blast(3) and AP(1).

specialRules.name: Spawn
specialRules.description: Once per game, when this model is activated, you may place a new unit of X fully within 6" of it.

specialRules.name: Glider Wings
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, place this model anywhere within 6" of its position.

specialRules.name: Protector
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get +2 to defense rolls whilst inside terrain.
